name: Haitian International Holdings Limited
description: Haitian International Holdings Limited is a leading manufacturer of injection molding machines and a key player in the global plastic machinery market. Founded in 1966 and headquartered in Ningbo, China, Haitian has grown to become one of the largest producers of injection molding machines in the world. The company specializes in the design and production of a wide range of injection molding machines that cater to various industries, including automotive, packaging, medical, and consumer goods. Haitian's commitment to innovation and quality has led to the development of several advanced technologies, including energy-saving machines and intelligent automation systems. With a focus on sustainability, Haitian aims to enhance production efficiency while reducing energy consumption and environmental impact. The company operates a global network of subsidiaries and service centers, ensuring that it can provide exceptional support and solutions to customers worldwide. As a publicly traded company, Haitian International is dedicated to delivering value to its shareholders through strategic growth and operational excellence, positioning itself as a trusted partner in the plastic processing industry.

seo.meta_title: Haitian International Holdings | Leading Injection Molding Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Haitian International Holdings Limited, a leader in injection molding machinery with a commitment to innovation and sustainability in the plastic processing industry.

faq.question: What does Haitian International specialize in?
faq.answer: Haitian International specializes in the manufacturing of injection molding machines and automation solutions.

faq.question: Where is Haitian International headquartered?
faq.answer: Haitian International is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Haitian International?
faq.answer: Zhiqiang Zhang is the CEO of Haitian International Holdings Limited.
